name: Acoustic Evenings
short_description: An intimate evening of acoustic performances by talented singer-songwriters.
long_description: Experience the magic of raw, unplugged music as talented singer-songwriters take the stage at Harmony Hall. Enjoy heartfelt performances in an intimate setting, perfect for music lovers seeking a soulful evening.
return_policy_specifics: Refundable up to 24 hours before the event.
